title: 客户端崩溃，是否与模组有关？
author: Luckily_Baby
txt_content:
服务器的地图莫名出现透明方块之后，
客户端也开始崩溃，查看了崩溃报告，发现里面一直是这个：
[17:58:10] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[17:58:10] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Post render
[17:58:10] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Post render
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: @ Post render
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: 1285: Out of memory
[17:58:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: ########## GL ERROR ##########

这是什么意思？
物品ID错误还是？
请求解决！！

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
内存溢出，请尝试调整内存
然后也没有别的了
